items.summary: Build a password-protected admin panel accessible via a dedicated route (e.g., /admin). The admin must enter a hardcoded password to gain access. Once logged in, the admin can: (1) view, add, edit, and delete products (name, description, price, stock quantity, image URL/path, category); (2) view and update order statuses (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled); (3) view all customer feedback messages submitted via the contact/feedback form.

Replace the existing contact form's purpose with a dual-purpose Customer Feedback & Contact form. The form collects the customer's name, email, and a message/feedback. Submissions are stored in the backend and are viewable in the admin panel's Feedback tab. Display the contact email vanshita310@gmail.com prominently in the ContactSection alongside the form.

Extend the backend Motoko actor to support the new data models and operations: (1) Products — stored with id, name, description, price, stockQuantity, imageUrl, category; CRUD operations; (2) Orders — stored with id, customerName, phone, address, productId, quantity, status, timestamp; create and list/update-status operations; (3) Feedback/Contact messages — already partially present, ensure the existing messages store is reused and admin list operation is available.

Add an interactive order placement system to the website. On the ProductShowcase or a dedicated Order section, customers can fill out a form with: their name, phone number, delivery address, product selection (from available products), and quantity. On submission, the order is stored in the backend with a timestamp and a default status of 'Pending'.
